atserias_quantum_2019.short: Atserias, Mančinska, Roberson, Šámal, Severini, & Varvitsiotis (2019)
atserias_quantum_2019.long: A. Atserias, L. Mančinska, D. E. Roberson, R. Šámal, S. Severini, and A. Varvitsiotis, ‘Quantum and non-signalling graph isomorphisms’, J. Comb. Theory, Ser. B, vol. 136, pp. 289–328, 2019, doi: 10.1016/j.jctb.2018.11.002.
